trans-unit.source: The argument of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs" /> 类型的参数。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventHandler>委托时，需要标识处理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，这将导致页后，可以将回发到服务器每次用户单击之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is handled by the `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler.

For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。
